title: From Far Away to G'Day
alt: Fish Talk's documentary project From Far Away to G'Day
description: From Far Away to G'Day is a documentary spotlighting six Asian immigrants' transformative journeys in Australia, from international students to community pioneers. For this project, I help with designing the pitch deck, film posters and maintaining the website using Wix. Support us to challenge stereotypes and celebrate diversity!

title: BubblePop
alt: BubblePop is an iOS game, UTS 42889 iOS Development Assignment 2
description: BubblePop is an iOS game with real-time scoring, physics-based animations, and good UI/UX design, demonstrating full-stack Swift development with CoreData integration and MVVM architecture for optimized performance.

title: Mind Capsule
alt: MindCapsule is a Full-Stack Hackathon (UNIHACK 2025) project, designed to help individuals better understand and manage their emotions, using principles from Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT). Name was inspired by Time Capsule.
description: MindCapsule is a Full-Stack Hackathon (UNIHACK 2025) project, designed to help individuals better understand and manage their emotions, using principles from Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT). Name was inspired by Time Capsule.

title: Be There
description: BeThere is an iOS app built with Swift by our team BlueOPERAT via Apple Foundation Program @UTS, it connects Working Holiday Visa (WHV) holders in Australia in small groups of 6 to foster real-world meetups, using playful AI (A Rat Bot) to spark conversations and ensure active engagement.
